text: Arau yetiya sihamtara ocarata santi athaba sankara kono sambada ahe tetiya sihamte se'ito pracara karai thake. Yadi sihamte se'i sambadato raachula arau sihamtara majata yisakale nirdesa pradanara adhikarai te'omlokaka janalehemtena tente sihamtara majata yisakale tathya anusandhana karae sihamte se'itora yatharthata nirnaya karaiba parailehemtena. Tomalokara prati yadi allahara anugraha arau rahamata nathakilehemtena tente tomalokara majara kichumanara bahirae ataye cayatanara anusarana karailehemtena
